description:
LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

CricFy Football Live Score808 – Live Scores & Fixtures

Stay updated with the latest football Live scores, fixtures, League Table Standings and results from leagues around the world! The Score808 keeps you in the game, live.

Key Features:

* Live Scores & Results: Get real-time updates for matches across all major leagues and tournaments.
* Fixtures & Schedules: Never miss a game with full fixture lists and match times.
* Team & Player Stats: Track your favorite teams and players with detailed stats.
* League Standings: Table of league stats like total points,games played,won,lost,draw e.t.c.
* User-Friendly Interface: Simple, fast, and intuitive navigation.

CricFy Football Live Score808 is the ultimate football companion app for fans who want instant updates anywhere, anytime.

Betting with betPawa is safe
We’ve got years of experience making customers smile. Deposits and withdrawals are fast, we pay winnings quickly and only use trusted mobile money services so your funds are safe at all times. If ever you have a problem, we’re here to talk however suits you best.

Customer care and trust
Part of making betting friendly is the dedication and focus we place on delivering the best customer service in the industry. We provide the exact help you need, at the exact moment you need it. Support is available every hour of every day. You can call, email, chat to us on Facebook Messenger and Telegram or even ask us to call you.

Helping to change lives
We love seeing the lives of customers and communities change for the better. Ambitious initiatives like Dream Maker (https://dreammaker.betpawa.com/) and Win BIG, Give Back, where we work closely with customers and communities to drive lasting change, are examples of projects that betPawa love to do.

Responsible Gambling
We believe in responsible gambling and want you to always enjoy playing with us by staying in control and only betting what you can afford. If you ever feel like gambling has become a problem, tell us and we’ll be in touch to help. If you would rather talk to independent specialists, we also provide contact information with local experts too.


Sports Betting
We offer betting markets on thousands of matches each week across all your favourite competitions, with a user-friendly interface so they're easy to find and bet on. You can bet on the match result, scorers, scoreline, number of goals/points and almost anything else you can think of.
We say “Bet Small, Win Big” because players can bet from as little as one pesewa to take advantage of our massive Win Bonus on eligible betslips with 3 legs or more, going up to 500% on betslips with 45 eligible legs.

Virtual Sports
Virtual sports betting works like traditional sports betting, but results are simulated using real data. There are 66 matches every 5 minutes and over 19,000 a day so you can bet at your convenience. betPawa’s Win Bonus is available whenever you bet on three or more eligible legs.

Games
You’ve got more opportunities than ever before to bet small and win BIG on betPawa Games. We have hundreds of games for you to play at any time from anywhere. They’re made for mobile, low on data usage and stakes, and fully certified to guarantee their fairness. Pick one and start playing.

Jackpots
betPawa offers two regular weekly Jackpots you can win BIG on. The weekend Pick17 - 1X2 Jackpot is your chance to turn a small ticket price into a huge jackpot prize. There are also consolation prizes for getting as many as four of the results wrong.

Pawa6
Pawa6 is a 100% free-to-play game that offers players a chance to win huge cash prizes, by correctly predicting the scorelines outcome of 6 football matches every two weeks. There are 5,000 guaranteed winners in every round. To play Pawa6, you just need a betPawa account. Sign up or sign in to betPawa, pick your Pawa6 username and start playing.

With the CricFy TV : Live Score Football app, you can stay updated with soccer live scores and stats, match highlights, and league standings at no cost. We cover matches from the Premier League to the World Cup, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action!

Get real-time score updates, detailed match stats, team standings, and more on your mobile device with our comprehensive football app.

CricFy TV : Live Score gives you access to a world of football, from live scores to in-depth league tables, team statistics, and match results. Discover matches and get detailed stats and live match scores on every game.

WHY CricFy TV : Live Score FOR FOOTBALL FANS?
- Live Sports Scores: Stay updated with real-time scores from matches around the world
- League Standings: View complete league tables with team positions and statistics
- Match Stats: Dive into detailed stats, scores, and team lineups
- Worldwide Coverage: Coverage of major competitions including Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, and more
- Accurate & Reliable: Trust our up-to-date data from football-data.org API
- Dark Mode: Beautiful dark and light themes for comfortable viewing
- Arabic Support: Full RTL layout support for Arabic users

LIVE MATCHES AND DETAILED STATS
Experience the thrill of football with live scores & stats, comprehensive league standings, and in-depth match analysis.
WORLDWIDE COVERAGE - LIVE MATCH SCORES

ACCURATE AND RELIABLE DATA
Trust in our accurate and up-to-date football data, sourced directly from football-data.org, one of the most reliable football data providers. We are dedicated to delivering the ultimate football experience straight to your fingertips.

Don't just watch the game – live it! Download CricFy TV : Live Score: Live Football Scores & Stats now and elevate your football fandom to a whole new level.
Data Source: All football data is provided by football-data.org API - a reliable and trusted source for football statistics and live scores.

Disclaimer: This app is made for football fans to follow live scores and statistics. The content in this app is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by any football league or organization. All data is sourced from football-data.org API.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB

• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

NOVA Soccer Hub App - delivers a complete Soccer tracking experience for fans worldwide. Whether you want to follow live scores, analyze matches, check team lineups, or explore player profiles, this app has it all—wrapped in a clean and intuitive interface.

NOVA Soccer Hub App Key Features:

* Live Match Center - Follow real-time updates with live scores, match time, key events, and team lineups.

* Detailed Statistics - View comprehensive stats including shots, passes, fouls, offsides, possession, and more—visually compared between both sides.

* Fixture & Schedule View - Plan ahead or look back with a calendar-based view of upcoming and past matches sorted by day.

* Predictions & Analytics - Check team performance, form streaks, head-to-head comparisons, and match outcome predictions based on data.

* Point Tables & Standings - Track team positions and points across various leagues and tournaments.

* Team Overview & Profiles - Get venue details, overall performance records, and recent match outcomes. Explore squad rosters categorized by position.

* Player Profiles - Dive into individual player stats, bio details (age, height, nationality, position), recent matches, and league-wise performance breakdown.

* Explore by Country - Search and filter content based on your favorite countries or regions, allowing for a personalized football-following experience.

* Favorites Tab - Save your favorite matches, teams, players, and leagues to quickly access them anytime from one central tab.

Whether you're a casual viewer or a dedicated football analyst, NOVA Soccer Hub App is dedicated to stay informed, entertained, and engaged—no matter the league, team, or competition. Download Nova Soccer Hub app now.

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).

• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

Huba Football is your all-in-one destination for immersive and real-time football live scores. Whether you're tracking live matches, analyzing team stats or individual player performance, Huba Football brings you closer to the game with clarity and depth.

App Key Features:

* Live Scores & Match Center:
Follow every match as it happens with real-time scores, game status updates, and live commentary. Home, away, and neutral venues are clearly displayed with intuitive UI.

* Detailed Match Statistics:
Access comprehensive team stats including shots on/off goal, blocked shots, fouls, corner kicks, and pass accuracy — all visualized in a clean and readable format.

* Fixtures & Results:
Stay up to date with ongoing, upcoming, and past fixtures. Navigate through daily match schedules and browse through historical results.

* Lineups & Formations:
View team formations with visual representation. Analyze how each team sets up with formations like 4-2-3-1, including detailed player positions.

* Goal & Event Timelines:
Track every key match moment: goals (normal and penalties), player substitutions, yellow/red cards, and more — all timestamped and structured.

* Player Profiles & Stats:
Explore in-depth player statistics such as goals, assists, passes completed, dribbles attempted/successful, and more. Access player transfer history and trophy achievements per season.

* Instant Push Notifications:
Get notified in real-time for match starts, goals, cards, and final results — never miss a moment that matters.

* Team Overview & Stadium Info:
Discover team insights including home ground details, stadium capacity, playing surface, and recent form with last 6 game results.

* Latest Football News:
Browse football headlines tailored for you. View articles with images and story highlights from the football world, all updated daily.

* Search & Discover Leagues:
Easily search for global competitions with season filters. Quickly access league details and navigate through team performances.

* Cards Stats:
Monitor discipline across competitions — view players with red card stats in structured and ranked format.

* Transfer History & Trophies:
Follow a player’s career journey with transfer movements and club changes. Also explore their earned trophies and seasonal accolades.

Huba Football is designed for fans who crave precision, clarity, and real-time interaction with the beautiful game. No official team or league names are required — just pure football data delivered intelligently. Download Huba Football app now.

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议
